item.title: 127: Raising Sons (Pt.2) Ft. Josiah/Levi/Simon Rock [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
Part 2 is here! This week, Aaron and his sons continue their conversation on father-son relationships and adulthood. If you missed the first part of this conversation,  click or tap here to listen to part 1!

More Resources: 

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Josiah Rock, Levi Rock, Simon Rock
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Josiah Rock, Levi Rock, Simon Rock

item.title: 126: The Gospel Truth about "Truth and Reconciliation Day" [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this special Friday broadcast Aaron addresses a timely question regarding how Christians should think and respond to the annual observation of the "National Day for Truth and Reconciliation" in Canada.

More Resources: 

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: 125: Raising Sons (Pt.1) Ft. Josiah/Levi/Simon Rock [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
Join us for a special edition of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock as Aaron is joined by his 3 sons to talk about Father-Son relationships: What Aaron has learned as a father, what his sons learned growing up, and principles Aaron implemented to raise his children for Christ. 

More Resources: 

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
